summary: The document is a segment from the John F. Kennedy assassination records collection, focusing on an investigation involving Manuel Marti, a private in the US Army, and a character reference check on Juanita Reyes. It outlines an attempt to interview Reyes about her possible acquaintance with Marti, which she denies after initially not recalling him. The document also contains administrative details like agency information, document type, and its classification status as 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS', last reviewed on 03/07/95.
key_findings: The document pertains to the JFK assassination records but centers on a distinct investigation involving US Army personnel.
It includes a character reference check on Juanita Reyes in relation to her acquaintance with Manuel Marti.
Reyes initially does not recall Marti and subsequently denies knowing him.
The document is classified as 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS' and was last reviewed on March 7, 1995.
